# Create LLMs.txt File from Repository Structure

## Primary Directive

Create a
comprehensive `llms.txt` file that serves as an entry point for LLMs to understand
and navigate the repository effectively. The file must comply with the llms.txt
specification and be optimized for LLM consumption while remaining
human-readable.
